ygData.subject: Re: New Topic, Languages!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: You need to be in a group and right click on the chat window and switch to the language and it will go up with time. Silvermyst
ygData.messageBody:
You need to be in a group and right click on the chat window and switch to
the language and it will go up with time.
Silvermyst

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Shane Murphy [SMTP:shanem@...]
> Sent: Monday, May 03, 1999 5:45 PM
> To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqpaladin] Re: New Topic, Languages!!!
>
> From: "Shane Murphy" <shanem@...>
>
> How do you start learning a new Language? I have been around elves
> talking
> Elvish before, but noticed no skill gain or message.
>
>
> Tuannon
> Bristlebane
>
>

> >Tiresias
